ygData.subject: Re: Vulois sees some old friends
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois was put into a CR chamber that was supposed to keep him in stasis lock until Zardus came to remove him. That s how they kept Squizzy were she was all

Vulois was put into a CR chamber that was supposed to keep him in 
stasis lock until Zardus came to remove him. That's how they kept 
Squizzy were she was all this time.


::Spears::

She kissed him back.  She couldn't help but smile. "Ramulus is a 
strong leader.  His followers would follow him to the pit if he asked 
them to.  He's very smart and not easily fooled. But does have a 
weakness. He cares. He cares about those who has served with him." 
She smiled at Prebon. "Just tell me when you want me to scream."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Vulois couldn't wait like this. He got out of his CR Chamber and 
> looked around. He wanted someone to notice him so they would change 
> his programming. He had to become part of the the Alliance if he 
> wanted to free Battera and Cybershark. He walked down the hall, not 
> caring if hew as picked up by any cameras. He went down to the 
> quarters section, thinking some bots must be there. The ones he 
found 
> were the unexpected ones. He saw Cybershark standing there, talking 
> to someone in their quarters. He was going to go up to him and 
demand 
> to be made Alliance. He got a bit closer and over-heard his 
> conversation. He wanted to escape! Maybe he wasn't under there 
> influence after all! He had to take a chance. He went up to him, 
and 
> saw that it was Battera he was talking too.
> 
> "Cybershark. It's me, Vulois. I think I can help get you out of 
here!"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> Brix and Fliq follow the others.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Prebon
> 
> (I gave him a cloaking device, whether he uses it is up to you.)
> 
> Prebon acknowledges Slayer, and looks up to the top of the cliff 
and 
> sees him. He turns to Spears.
> 
> "What a marvelous day we are going to have, eh love." He kissed 
> her, "Tell me, what were your impressions of Ramulus when you met 
> him?"
> 
> (Dcoburn, I need you to respond to Gotron and than to Starscream. 
And 
> by the way, how was your Friday off? That's right! Oh yeah, take 
> that! Big four day weeked for us! Canadian Thanksgiving! So beats 
> your scrawny three day weekend for your silly Columbus Day!)
